dr_report_evaluation_qa.answer: Healthcare CRM systems are revolutionizing patient interactions by using data analysis and AI to enable personalized, proactive care management. This technology helps providers identify high-risk patients and intervene early, leading to improved health outcomes.

The global healthcare CRM market is expected to grow to approximately $30.65 billion by 2030, with a 7.7% CAGR from 2024, fueled by the increasing adoption of digital health solutions and the demand for improved patient engagement and operational efficiency.

By 2025, healthcare CRM will focus on AI-driven personalization and automation, integrating closely with chronic care management tools. Enhanced patient data security and cloud-based platforms will be prioritized to improve patient engagement and retention.

dr_report_evaluation_qa.answer: We anticipate a 15% reduction in patient complaints by Q3 2025, driven by the integration of AI-driven personalization and automation features.
